.. _arc_hal_builtin:

Built-In Functions
##################

Compiler built-in functions are used to invoke certain processor operations
without writing assembly code. In embARC BSP, a series of built-in functions are
provided for both the MetaWare and GNU toolchains.


API Reference
*************

.. doxygengroup:: ARC_HAL_BUILTIN
   :project: embARC_bsp
